# Career Ladder / 職涯階梯

| 等級 | 描述 | 參考 |
| ---- | ---- | ---- |
| L1 | Foundation Engineer | stage1 |
| L2 | Senior Engineer | stage2 |
| L3 | Staff / Architect | stage3 |
| L4 | Principal / Chief Architect | stage4 |
| L5 | Tech Leader / CTO Track | stage5 |

> 每階需對應技能評分與特質評分門檻。
